summary: This is an email exchange from November 18, 2020, between attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim and a Bureau of Prisons official named Nicole regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's detention conditions. Sternheim inquires about Maxwell's quarantine status after a COVID-19 test and the status of her scheduled legal calls and visits.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was in federal custody under inmate number 02879-509 as of November 2020.
Maxwell received a nasal swab test for COVID-19 and was placed in the SHU (Special Housing Unit) for a 14-day period, indicating quarantine protocols.
Her attorney, Bobbi C. Sternheim, had confirmed legal calls and in-person visits scheduled, which were potentially at risk due to the quarantine.
The correspondence highlights the operational challenges of legal representation during the COVID-19 pandemic in a high-profile detention case.
